name: She Sells Seashells
description:
She sells sea-shells on the sea-shore.
The shells she sells are sea-shells, I’m sure.
For if she sells sea-shells on the sea-shore
Then I’m sure she sells sea-shore shells.

Join Mary Anning, one of Britain's most prolific paleontologists, on a stroll along the beaches of Dorset and see what you can find.

Please view my development blog here.

This was made as part of the 10:10 Games/Women in Games game jam
